Home » 39P6 Dhammānuloma (1), Dukadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (6) » 1 Hetuduka, Duka
1.16 Hetuduka, āsavasāsavaduka
Hetuduka, Duka
Hetuduka, āsavasāsavaduka
38.
111Hetuṃ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
112Hetuyā pañca…pe…  avigate pañca. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
39.
113Hetuṃ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
114Hetuyā nava…pe…  avigate nava. (Sabbattha vitthāro.)
